Integration of the OpenCV Machine Learning library for Artificial Neural Network classification of gridded features. Open Source Computer Vision

Number of LayersIntegerANN_LAYERSYou can specify the number of layers in the network (not including input and output layer).Minimum: 1 Default: 3
